query: query TutorCalendarEvents($dateStart: Date!, $dateEnd: Date!, $tzname: String!) { currentUser { tutor { calendar(dateStart: $dateStart, dateEnd: $dateEnd, tzname: $tzname) { nodes { __typename ... on TimeoffTimeslot { id dateStart dateEnd title } ... on LessonTimeslot { dateStart dateEnd lesson { id status client { user { fullName } } } } ... on ReservedRecurrentLessonTimeslot { id dateStart dateEnd recurrentLessonConfig { client { user { fullName } } } } } } } } }
